dataflowSinks.name: UserQueryoutputdelimitedtxt
dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UserQueryoutputdelimitedtxt

scriptLines: employees as (userName as string, jobTitleName as string, employeeCode as string, techstack as string[], emailAddress as string, image as string)[]

sources.name: empnew_pivot_DelimitedText1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empnew_pivot_DelimitedText1

sources.name: DepatmentDelimitedText2
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DepatmentDelimitedText2

scriptLines: IT, HR, Payroll union(byName: true)~> union1
